definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: Q. Did Ambien play a role in the car crash?
sentences.chinese: 安眠藥在車禍中扮演了什麼角色？

sentences.english: He was in the kitchen that night.
sentences.chinese: 他那晚在廚房，是他放安眠藥在熱牛奶裏了嗎？

sentences.english: A couple of ludes put Max in a better mood.
sentences.chinese: 服了兩片安眠酮後馬克斯情緒穩定多了。

sentences.english: Sugared wild jujube brings people sound sleep.
sentences.chinese: 酸棗加白糖，安眠大幫忙。
您是否需要一些安眠藥呢？

sentences.english: Certain drugs such as benzodiazepines, which are tranquillisers and hypnotics .
sentences.chinese: 某些藥物，如苯二氮類藥物，這是鎮靜劑和安眠藥。

sentences.english: He went to see his doctor, who prescribed some extra-strong.
sentences.chinese: 他去看醫生，醫生給他開了一些加強型安眠藥。

sentences.english: This wine is like a sleeping potion that kept the men asleep until morning.
sentences.chinese: 那酒就像安眠藥一樣，使那些好漢一直睡到早上。

sentences.english: Do you keep your bed partner awake with the jerking movements of your legs?
sentences.chinese: 你是否因爲你腳的抽搐導致同牀共枕之人無法安眠？

sentences.english: If counting sheep won't help, you may need to take sleeping pills.
sentences.chinese: 如果想像中數羊的方法行不通，你也許要用安眠藥。

sentences.english: Sleeping pills somehow didn't work for me last night.
sentences.chinese: 安眠藥昨晚不知怎麼搞的好象對我沒用。

sentences.english: Madam Pomfrey had given the Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher a Sleeping Potion.
sentences.chinese: 龐弗雷夫人給了她一付安眠藥水。

sentences.english: ‘Your mother took sleeping tablets,’Dr Pratt said.‘Did
sentences.chinese: “你的媽媽服了安眠藥，”普拉特醫生說。

sentences.english: Progesterone is a great sleeping pill.
He whom the thought of love vexes eats and sleeps very little.
sentences.chinese: 沉浸於愛的人，食不甘味，寢不安眠。

sentences.english: By their uproar they prevent sleep" .

definition: to calm (soothe) the nerves/to relieve uneasiness of body and mind
to sleep soundly/(fig.) to rest easy/to be free of worries
ghost of one who died unjustly/departed spirit demanding vengeance for grievances
to freshen up/to be cautious or vigilant/to watch out/stimulant to enhance mental performance/stay-awake drug/agrypnotic
to be fast asleep/(fig.) to lie dormant/to lie undiscovered
